Verses.10: And so the Angel said to them, "Do not be afraid. Behold, I bring you good news, that will bring great joy to all people.
Verses.11: For today, in the city of David, a savior was born for all. He is Christ the Lord.
Verses.12: And this will be a sign for you: you will find a baby wrapped in cloth, and lying in a manger."
Verses.13: Then suddenly a multitude of heavenly angels appeared with the angel, praising God, and saying,
Verses.14: "Glory to God in the highest! And peace on earth! God's desire for all peoples!"

Changes: 2022-12-2 - Paul Prins: First translation of chapter 2:10-14.
